channel.title: blog on Morja
channel.description: Recent content in blog on Morja

item.title: I AM MORJA ZALA
item.description: I started to create under the artistic name Morja in the beginning of high school, but to be honest Morja has been in me since ever.

item.title: NANA IRGOLIÄŒ
item.description: I met Nana over instagram around a year ago, well just about when lockdown started.

item.title: FASHION REVOLUTION part 2
item.description: Today I’m continuing my last blog where I wrote about The Fashion Revolution movement, because I didn’t want to make that one too long.

item.title: FASHION REVOLUTION part 1
item.description: In today’s blog post I will present to you the Fashion Revolution movement, which centers around the anniversary of the Rana Plaza factory collapse on 24th of April, 2013.

item.title: LIFE IS A COLOUR PALETTE: PROLOGUE
item.description: I am here to feel. I am here to live.

item.title: HAPPY SCRUNCHIES
item.description: In today’s post I want to share with you some of my thoughts about textiles and how I came up with the idea of making my happy colourful scrunchies.

item.title: INTERNATIONAL WOMEN'S DAY
item.description: Today, the 8th of March marks International Women Day (IWD) and I would like to remember amazing women who influence me and with whom I worked with in the past.
